verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump 's economic adviser Larry Kudlow] [V: told] [ARG2: Politico] [ARG1: that he was unsure a new NAFTA could be reached before a congressional deadline . If not deal is sent to Congress by Thursday , NAFTA would not receive a vote in 2018] .

President Trump 's economic adviser Larry Kudlow told Politico that [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: unsure a new NAFTA could be reached before a congressional deadline] . If not deal is sent to Congress by Thursday , NAFTA would not receive a vote in 2018 .
